[size=24pt]Join Dark-Legazy[/size] [b][url=http://DrClient.Webs.Com]DrClient.Webs.Com[/url] [/b] [b][color=purple] [size=18pt][b][url=http://DrClient.Webs.Com[/url][/b][/size]
[url=http://DrClient.Webs.Com]DrClient.Webs.Com[/url]
The Features Include... -Custom Ranks With All Crowns Fully Working -New Skill Interface -Basic Staff List -Working Cash Orb -Loyalty Titles With a Few Custom ones -Fading Hitmarks -Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses. -Combat Icons Next to Damage -All Important Summoning Special Attacks -10Man "Raid" Style Bosses -Nomad -Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking -Wilderness Revernants -Elite Slayer Tasks -FULLY working Overloads 100% RS -39 Jad Waves, Custom -Unique Custom Home -Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! -100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! -PKP Shops -Even More NPC Anims Added -Player Owned Shops -Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded -PERFECT Bridding / Switching -Fully Webclient Ready -Soulwars Cape & More Items Added -Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's) -317 Classic RS Graphics -NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE -Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields -NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED -602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters -Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother! -FUNPK Area -Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP -Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server -Near Flawless Combat System -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow -Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring -Dungeoneering -Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild) Loyalty Titles [/b]
[url=http://DrClient.Webs.Com]DrClient.Webs.Com[/url]
[ul][li][b] 1: "Lord" 2: "Sir" 3: "Lionheart" 4: "Desperado" 5: "Bandito" 6: "King" 7: "Big Cheese" 8: "Wunderkind" 9: "Crusader" 10: "Overlord" 11: "Bigwig" 12: "Count" 13: "Duderino" 14: "Hell Raiser" 15: "Baron" 16: "Duke" 17: "Lady" 18: "Dame" 19: "Dudette" 20: "Baroness" 21: "Countess" 22: "Overlordess" 23: "Duchess" 24: "Queen" 25: "Mod" 26: "Admin" 27: "Server Sponcer" 28: "Owner" [/b][/li] [li][/li][/ul]

item.title: Dark-Legazy-Web-Client
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

May I ask why you used ‘strikethrough’ for everything? It doesn’t look very appealing at all. I was also curious as to why you listed this:

Player Rights Trail Mod - 7 Mod - 1 Trail Admin - 8 Head Of Staff (Also Admin) - 2 Owner - 6 Donator - 4 Server Sponsor -5 Verteran - 9
I'm not trying to be rude whatsoever, however, why would we care what the player rights are?

This thread needs more work. The way it is now won’t draw in any new players. Sorry.

Read full topic
